attributes.action: directly intervene in the case of a Nigerian family who are due to be deported from Plymouth soon.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Nigerian family are due to be deported from Plymouth within the next few weeks. The family are model citizens - the mother a school governor and trained health worker, one of the sons passed 12 GCSEs and gained an A* in Maths. Another of the children suffers from sickle cell anaemia, and it is unlikely he would recieve the medication needed, and he may die if he cannot recieve the medication.

Please support this petition.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
